resources.string:
Terms of Service:


By using the Kayangan Express mobile application, you agree to abide by the following terms:


1. You must be 13 years or older to use this application.
 2. You agree to provide accurate and complete information during the registration process.
 3. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.
 4. You agree not to use the application for any illegal or unauthorized purpose.
 5. You agree not to attempt to disrupt the integrity or security of the application or its servers.


Privacy Policy:


Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy outlines how your personal information is collected, used, and shared when you use the Kayangan Express mobile application:


- Information We Collect:
 We collect personal information you provide when using the application, including your name, contact details, and payment information.


- How We Use Your Information:
 We use your information to process orders, communicate with you, and improve our services.


- Sharing Your Information:
 We may share your information with third-party service providers to fulfill orders and provide support.


- Data Retention:
 We will retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide services to you and as required by law.


- Contact Us:
 If you have any questions or concerns about our Terms of Service or Privacy Policy, please contact us at support@kayanganexpress.com.


This document was last updated on [Date].
